Try.description: IntelliJ IDEA allows you to navigate between occurrences. First of all, select cellphone in the code, and press to call the Find action.
To find next occurrences use <action="EditorEnter"> or <action="FindNext">

With the search panel closed you can still use these shortcuts to navigate between occurrences of the item being searched for earlier. Close search panel by pressing <action="EditorEscape"> and try to find next occurrence with <action="FindNext">
